name: Mul- Again
description:
Warning!

This game includes content that may be disturbing!

How to play

1. Get to the portal

2.Black blocks kill Mul

3.The Spike kills Mul

4. The spike destroys anything it touches but is also destroyed

5. Mul and the spike move at the same time with the arrow keys

6. Black Tiles are moveable by dragging and dropping

7. You only get one spike

8. You have a limited number of clicks

9. The number is lying and says you have one more click then you actually do.

10. Running out of clicks kills Mul

11. Dying restarts you to level one

12. If your spike is destroyed or you accidently click press the restart button to redo the level

13.  The story makes no sense but there is a cutscene

14.  Is it not simple?

15.Everything interacts with everything

16. There is 3 levels and a boss battle

17. I'm too lazy to make good sprites.
